languages.text: "Коли Простор в осаде, то я знаю, где искать свою стаю — в гуще сражений. Когда мы прибудем на Футфол, я желаю поговорить с Калькасаром и узнать, в какую битву он направил моих братьев".

"If the Expanse is under siege, then I know where to look for my pack: in the thick of battle. When we arrive at Footfall, I want to talk to Calcazar and find out to what battlefront he has sent my brothers."
languages.original_text: "Коли Простор в осаде, то я знаю, где искать свою стаю — в гуще сражений. Когда мы прибудем на Футфол, я желаю поговорить с Калькасаром и узнать, в какую битву он направил моих братьев".

"If the Expanse is under siege, then I know where to look for my pack: in the thick of battle. When we arrive at Footfall, I want to talk to Calcazar and find out to what battlefront he has sent my brothers."

languages.text: “既然科罗努斯扩区遭到围攻，那我知道该去哪里寻找我的狼群了——他们肯定在最激烈的战斗之中。等我们回到落脚港之后，我想和卡尔卡扎谈谈，问问他把我的兄弟们派到了哪片前线。”
languages.original_text: "If the Expanse is under siege, then I know where to look for my pack: in the thick of battle. When we arrive at Footfall, I want to talk to Calcazar and find out to what battlefront he has sent my brothers."

traits.locale_text: “既然科罗努斯扩区遭到围攻，那我知道该去哪里寻找我的狼群了——他们肯定在最激烈的战斗之中。等我们回到落脚港之后，我想和卡尔卡扎谈谈，问问他把我的兄弟们派到了哪片前线。”

languages.text: "Wenn die Ausdehnung belagert wird, dann weiß ich, wo ich mein Rudel suchen muss: auf dem Schlachtfeld. Wenn wir auf Footfall eintreffen, möchte ich mit Calcazar sprechen und herausfinden, an welche Front er meine Brüder geschickt hat."
languages.original_text: "If the Expanse is under siege, then I know where to look for my pack: in the thick of battle. When we arrive at Footfall, I want to talk to Calcazar and find out to what battlefront he has sent my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Ausdehnung belagert wird, dann weiß ich, wo ich mein Rudel suchen muss: auf dem Schlachtfeld. Wenn wir auf Footfall eintreffen, möchte ich mit Calcazar sprechen und herausfinden, an welche Front er meine Kameraden geschickt hat."

languages.text: «Si la Extensión se halla bajo asedio, entonces ya sé dónde buscar a mi manada: en el fragor del combate. Cuando lleguemos a Paso, deseo hablar con Calcazar y averiguar a qué campo de batalla ha enviado a mis hermanos».
languages.original_text: "If the Expanse is under siege, then I know where to look for my pack: in the thick of battle. When we arrive at Footfall, I want to talk to Calcazar and find out to what battlefront he has sent my brothers."

traits.locale_text: «Si la Extensión se halla bajo asedio, entonces ya sé dónde buscar a mi manada: en el fragor del combate. Cuando lleguemos a Paso, deseo hablar con Calcazar y averiguar a qué campo de batalla ha enviado a mis camaradas».

languages.text: « Si les Étendues sont assiégées, je sais où trouver ma meute : au milieu du champ de bataille. Quand nous arriverons à Castel, je veux parler à Calcazar pour savoir où il a envoyé mes frères se battre. »
languages.original_text: "If the Expanse is under siege, then I know where to look for my pack: in the thick of battle. When we arrive at Footfall, I want to talk to Calcazar and find out to what battlefront he has sent my brothers."

traits.locale_text: « Si les Étendues sont assiégées, je sais où trouver ma meute : au milieu du champ de bataille. Quand nous arriverons à Castel, je veux parler à Calcazar pour savoir où il a envoyé mes frères se battre. »

languages.text: 「エクスパンスが包囲されているのなら、どこを探せば俺の仲間が居るはわかっている。フットフォールに到着したら、カルカサルに話を聞き、奴が俺の同胞をどの戦線に送り込んだのか調べたい」
languages.original_text: "If the Expanse is under siege, then I know where to look for my pack: in the thick of battle. When we arrive at Footfall, I want to talk to Calcazar and find out to what battlefront he has sent my brothers."

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスが包囲されているのなら、どこを探せば俺の仲間が居るはわかっている。フットフォールに到着したら、カルカサルに話を聞き、奴が俺の仲間をどの戦線に送り込んだのか調べたい」

languages.text: "Enginlik kuşatma altındaysa sürümü nerede arayacağım bellidir: Savaşın ortasında. Binliman'a vardığımızda Calcazar'la konuşmak ve kardeşlerimi hangi cepheye gönderdiğini öğrenmek istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "If the Expanse is under siege, then I know where to look for my pack: in the thick of battle. When we arrive at Footfall, I want to talk to Calcazar and find out to what battlefront he has sent my brothers."

traits.locale_text: "Enginlik kuşatma altındaysa sürümü nerede arayacağım bellidir: Savaşın ortasında. Binliman'a vardığımızda Calcazar'la konuşmak ve kardeşlerimi hangi cepheye gönderdiğini öğrenmek istiyorum."
